biotools.summary: SomatoSim is a tool that simulates single nucleotide variants at any variant allele fraction and depth of coverage. SomatoSim takes an analysis ready BAM file as input and SomatoSim outputs a BAM file containing simulated variants. Use SomatoSim to evaluate variant calling tools, algorithms, and pipelines.
